title: Deviltry
description: Never trust easy money. Words to live by, far as Sally Carson is concerned. But as captain, there comes a time when casting aside her instinct and taking the job is the only course likely to keep her spacecraft, Wanderlust, in the sky. Passenger transport is easy as they come, the money easier. This go 'round, though, Sally should've stuck to her guns. What starts as a quick run to the moon soon becomes a run from the law, putting Wanderlust and its crew in danger. With everything on the line itâ€™s up to Sally to save the day, save her crew, and get paid the best way she knows how: With a bit of deviltry.
author: Stephanie Embry
